message.body: Didn't get the job at Carleton. They actually called me to tell me.
They said a lot if nice things and said they want to recruit me for e tenured track position in 2 years for a fiction filmmaker
But they went with someone that was a replacement, not gonna bring anything new to the table
I guess that's kinda encouraging. What now?
Yeah I didn't wanna move there. Even just for a year.
I don't blame you. Maybe it's better you didn't get it then.
Who knows. Apparently getting jobs is impossible.
We may be marginally employed for the rest of our lives
Lol. I just hate this thought of being 40 and still just making it.
Yeah, I don't feel old but I guess it's becoming less "acceptable" or something
